titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z49: Ketubah, 1897.

notesStmt.note: This ketubbah was lost during the second year of the couple's marriage. Their replacement ketubbah, written in 1899, is preserved in the library: see KET Z50.

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Hebrew
